title: Mahjong African Dream
description: Mahjong African Dream is a classic mahjong game with exotic flavor. Play one of 16 boards that symbolize black continent.
instructions: Classic mahjong rules apply here as well. Tap on identical pairs of free dices in order to remove them from the table. Faster you do it, the better. If you get stuck you can ask for a hint, or shuffle the whole board.

title: Hiking Mahjong
description: Hiking Mahjong is a fun and challenging puzzle game where the goal is to eliminate all the tiles on the board by matching two identical tiles with two open sides. You can match tiles horizontally or vertically, but not diagonally. Simply tap on two identical tiles with two open sides to remove them. If you run out of moves, you can shuffle the tiles or use a hint. Clear the board to win the level, but use hints wisely as they are limited. Enjoy this game suitable for all ages!
instructions: Use mouse or touch to play this game.

title: Pizza Maker
description: Make a delicious pizza, bake it in the oven and have a lot of fun slicing it! Create your own delicious pizza and make this a mouth-watering experience. Unleash your creativity - choose from a huge selection of ingredients and create the kind of pizza you like.
